In the beginning of a word: g does not come before j, i, í, y, ý, e, ei, ey, æ
In the middle of a word: g comes after any consonant or before l,n

In the beginning of a word: g comes before j, i, í, y, ý, e, ei, ey, æ
In the middle of a word: g comes after l,n,r and before j,i,í,ei,ey,æ
g comes after any vowel and before a,u,ð,r
g comes after a vowel and before i,j
g comes after á,ó,ú and before a,u

In the beginning of a word: k comes before j, i, í, y, ý, e, ei, ey, æ
k does not come before j, i, í, y, ý, e, ei, ey, æ

Example of middle of word: skipta, Egyptaland, september, keypti, keppti, sleppti
